Question: Which Alg*?
Range: Connected | Cycle | MSTKruskal | MSTPrim | Number | StrongC

Question: Which Gtp*?
Constraint/Rule: if (!(!Alg*.MSTKruskal && !Alg*.MSTPrim)) {Gtp* = Undirected;Wgt* = Weighted;}if (Alg*.Connected) {Gtp* = Undirected;Src = true;}if (Alg*.StrongC) {Gtp* = Directed;Src* = DFS;}

Question: Which HiddenGtp*?
Range: DirectedOnlyVertices | DirectedWithEdges | DirectedWithNeighbors | UndirectedOnlyVertices | UndirectedWithEdges | UndirectedWithNeighbors

Question: Which Implementation*?
Constraint/Rule: if (!(!Gtp*.Directed || HiddenGtp*.DirectedOnlyVertices)) {disAllow(Implementation*.OnlyVertices);}if (!(!Gtp*.Directed || HiddenGtp*.DirectedWithEdges)) {disAllow(Implementation*.WithEdges);}if (!(!Gtp*.Directed || HiddenGtp*.DirectedWithNeighbors)) {disAllow(Implementation*.WithNeighbors);}if (!(!Gtp*.Undirected || HiddenGtp*.UndirectedOnlyVertices)) {disAllow(Implementation*.OnlyVertices);}if (!(!Gtp*.Undirected || HiddenGtp*.UndirectedWithEdges)) {disAllow(Implementation*.WithEdges);}if (!(!Gtp*.Undirected || HiddenGtp*.UndirectedWithNeighbors)) {disAllow(Implementation*.WithNeighbors);}if (!(!Wgt*.Weighted || WeightedOnlyVertices)) {disAllow(Implementation*.OnlyVertices);}if (!(!Wgt*.Weighted || WeightedWithEdges)) {disAllow(Implementation*.WithEdges);}if (!(!Wgt*.Weighted || WeightedWithNeighbors)) {disAllow(Implementation*.WithNeighbors);}
